review: Apple TV (MD199LL/A) is a pretty good supplement to my entertainment system. You can access many different non-apple accounts from; the NHL network to Vimeo and from youtube to Netflix. Also, you have the same access to the iTunes store that you would from a computer (albeit in a different interface). The real great thing about appleTV is that you can "mirror" your macbook and iphone to your television - this basically means that you can watch your computer screen on your TV. This only works if you have the iPhone 5 (or newer) and a 2011 or newer macbook pro - I'm not sure about other apple products, so please read the fine print before buying! Also, with slightly older apple technology (say iPhone 4) you will still be able to use airplay to play music and videos.However, I feel that apple is still lacking in the total user interface with appleTV. As of April 2013, they do not have access to an app store, so what you see on the main screen is what you get.
author: Johnny Vigneux
